reviews.review_msg: tough but fair, interesting lecturer, intelligent
Course Material Interesting, Very Good Lecturer

lectures are impossible to sit through! He trails off, is unclear. It seems like none of his lectures actually have a point, but because there's no text book, you have to attend. Don't taker this class.
Horrible. Very unclear & unfair marker. He has no marking criteria.. Do not take this class. Even though it seems like an easy GPA booster,  his marking will make you wish you never took it.
Unclear and offensive. Not a good proff. His questions are poorly worded. Luckily his marking is fair.

I would highly recommend this class to anyone interested in mental illnesspsych or looking for a GPA booster, easy class, just do well on the assignments and quizzes. However, criteria is not clear for how he grades and his lectures are boring and way too long for a 3 hour time slot which he uses up.

The 106 I took was moviesmental illness (they're all different).Great prof. VERY easy class, midterm and final are the exact same and involve watching a movie and commenting on it. Responds quickly to emails and as a psychologist has lots of good stories!!

Lectures are long and filled with stories that don't really go anywhere. Tests and assignments are super easy, but I've seen several yes or no questions spawn their own mini lectures. Definitely a good class if you want easy marks, but are willing to suffer 3 hours of boredom
Best prof ever! Very nice guy, helpful when you have questions. Very clear on what he wants so the project was a breeze. Exams pretty easy if you just attend his lecture =)
Easy class.  No need to come to lectures, you'll just end up sleeping. Just study off the online lecture notes and you'll be fine.
He gets really caught up in tangents. It is hard for him to get through a lecture in a timely manner; nice to see a prof so into their work though.

Monotone voice, incredibly boring lectures, he goes off on rants about stuff that doesn't even matter and then tests you on it after. Exams make up your entire grade, but are all multiple choice. I would not recommend taking any course with him, unless you just want to sleep throughout the entire class
